Authorize.auz could not be fond in this rar?

The authorize.auz file appears after you run patch in 

C:programdataabletonlive 9 suite

you should put the patch in the Program folder run patch as admin and authorize.auz file will be there

If You Followed install video you installed the program were they wanted you to right then you were supposed to right it down in the were I installed ableton text 

If You Follow Video Pause @ each step and take you time you will have it so first uninstall the ableton you installed before then start fresh...
I have downloaded a number of your Ableton packs...none of which have the patch file in the patch folder.  ????  Where is it?

if you watch the video at 3 min 45 into install video it will show you were you should of installed ableton...

you should put patch in this folder and run as admin

C:ProgramDataAbletonLive 9 SuiteProgram

And Authorize.auz file willget Download Right After Patch Is Finished It Searches For Path For Like 5 Seconds And Patchs

@deltasniper. hi! i have ableton 9.0.1 on my pc installed, i need to update it to 9.0.4 because of a maxforlive plugin requirement. i'm new here on TPB so i don't get it how to write you a private message.i wondered if i can just download the free update from the ableton site and use your .auz ,will it work??

also i wanted to ask if you know if someone has cracked the challenge/response for max6 because i need it for my graduation project.

thanks.

AMAZING! I don't know what people are talking about, amazing video, amazing files. works perfectly!

@kol I would stay with 9.0.1 if you paid for pluggin and cannot re install it but if you can run its setup again I would uninstall old version install new version run your pluggin were you would normally run it hope this helps

i'm an idiot. This works great. There's an explanation for why this might happen on Ableton's page, just google the error.
